Ref: When the logical ID of this resource is provided to the Ref intrinsic function, Ref returns the resource name, such as mystack-elasticsea-abc1d2efg3h4. For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain, such as arn:aws:es:us-west-2:123456789012:domain/mystack-elasti-1ab2cdefghij. This returned value is the same as the one returned by AWS::Elasticsearch::Domain.DomainArn.

The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain, such as arn:aws:es:us-west-2:123456789012:domain/mystack-elasti-1ab2cdefghij. This returned value is the same as the one returned by AWS::Elasticsearch::Domain.Arn.
The domain-specific endpoint that's used for requests to the OpenSearch APIs, such as search-mystack-elasti-1ab2cdefghij-ab1c2deckoyb3hofw7wpqa3cm.us-west-1.es.amazonaws.com.
